column4: when I run my depmod -a it gives me a fatal error and says that access is denied for writing. I've got the driver installed in ndiswrapper and consol sees the card, but gnome doesn't and I can't get it to install
/You/ wasted a couple of keystrokes because you forgot sudo.... i waste enough time by hanging out in #ubuntu, so these 30 seconds don't hurt too much :-)
I've when there and gone through the install for my card, I'm still not able to use it.
